name: Alma Jordan Library
description:
Alma Jordan Library is a library offering print and digital resources.

Floor 1:
-Circulation & Access Services (C&AS): Loans counter, Course Reserves, Engineering & Physical Sciences collection.
-Library Accounts Unit: Payments for printing/photocopying and fines.
-STARRS (St. Augustine Research & Reference Services): Public computer lab with 38 PCs, B/W and colour printers.

Floor 2:
-Agriculture & Life Sciences Collection: Core texts and journals for agricultural and biological sciences.
-West Indian Materials & Special Collections Research Room: Non-circulating Caribbean and UWI archival materials; open to postgraduates and faculty by request.

Floor 3:
-Humanities Collection: Literature, history, philosophy, languages.
-Multimedia Collection: Audio-visual materials, DVDs, microforms.
-UEC (User Education Centre): Computer lab with 36 workstations, plus printers; supports instructional workshops and thesis checking.

Floor 4:
-Social Sciences Collection: Sociology, economics, psychology, political science.
-Law Collection: Statutes, case law reports, legal journals.
